trans-unit.source: You can print debug text at runtime with DebugText. For example, you can use this to display a message when a problem occurs.
trans-unit.target: You can print debug text at runtime with DebugText. For example, you can use this to display a message when a problem occurs.

trans-unit.source: !Note Debug text is automatically disabled when you build the game in release mode.
trans-unit.target: !Note Debug text is automatically disabled when you build the game in release mode.

trans-unit.source: In the Update method of your script, add:
trans-unit.target: In the Update method of your script, add:

trans-unit.source: Where x and y are the pixel coordinates to display the text at.
trans-unit.target: Where x and y are the pixel coordinates to display the text at.

trans-unit.source: The debug message is displayed when you run the game.
trans-unit.target: The debug message is displayed when you run the game.

trans-unit.source: The following script checks that the texture MyTexture is loaded. If it isn't loaded, the game displays the debug text "MyTexture not loaded".
trans-unit.target: The following script checks that the texture MyTexture is loaded. If it isn't loaded, the game displays the debug text "MyTexture not loaded".
